channel.title: Adding Npc dialogue...no errors but doesnt work...wtf
channel.description:
Im having trouble adding Npc dialogue for a quest im am creating.This is vital toward the quest and i seemed to have done everything right in client...
from NPCwannetalk = NPC ID in second click because the npc has a right click to Creating the actually dialogue.I ahve no errors but it still does not work.I have only done it in the client.java.Is there anything else i need to know about npc dialogue.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 15, 2008, 02:21:41 pm[/size][hr]Does anyone know lol....i can show what i have done if you ask..

item.title: Adding Npc dialogue...no errors but doesnt work...wtf

item.source: Adding Npc dialogue...no errors but doesnt work...wtf

item.title: Adding Npc dialogue...no errors but doesnt work...wtf
item.dc:creator: @dontreadthis dontreadthis
item.description:
@dontreadthis wrote:

[code]case 613: //Joe
npcDiag(“Joe”,"",“Omg i found this wierd money!”,“Its very shiny.”,"",613);
break;

case 614: //Joe
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(playerName.replaceAll("_", " "), 4884);
sendFrame126(“What is it?”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);
sendFrame75(pCHead, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

case 615: //Joe
npcDiag(“Joe”,“I do not know.”,“I got it from a volcano.”,“It was a city in there.”,"",613);
break;

case 616: //Joe
npcDiag(“Joe”,"",“Maybe you can go and see”," what it is.","",613);
break;

case 617: //Joe
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(playerName.replaceAll("_", " "), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Okay!!!Volcanic place right?”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);
sendFrame75(pCHead, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

case 618: //Joe
npcDiag(“Joe”,"",“Good luck!!! and yes, at a volcanic area.”,“Very hot.”,"",613);
sendQuest("@yel@The Mysterious Money", 7333);
q1stage = 1;
break;[/code]

} else if (NpcDialogue == 613 || NpcDialogue == 614 || NpcDialogue == 615 || NpcDialogue == 616 || NpcDialogue == 617 || NpcDialogue == 618) { NpcDialogue += 1; NpcDialogueSend = false;
